<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 580 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
If a suit of armor has any runes, it has the [invested](/Traits.aspx?ID=98) trait, requiring you to invest it to get its magical benefits.
</column>
